Title: All You'll Be Eating Is Cannibals
Writer: George Pelecanos (created by), David Simon (created by), Richard Price, Carl Capotorto
Actors: James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gbenga Akinnagbe, Chris Bauer
Plot: Temporarily flush with cash, Frankie (James Franco) is tapped by Candy (Maggie Gyllenhaal) to be a co-producer on "Red Hot." Lori (Emily Meade) eyes a plum role in the film, but still feels...
